awards.title: 4x American Invitational Mathematics Examination Qualifier
awards.description: Qualified for the American Invitational Mathematics Examination, ranking in the top 5% in the American Math Competition.

awards.title: Two Sigma American Math Competition 10B Certificate of Excellence
awards.description: Awarded as the 2nd highest female scorer in Southern California and Nevada.

awards.title: High Honors on the U.S. National Chemistry Olympiad
awards.description: Ranked in the top 50 of all competitors nationwide.

awards.title: Perfect Score on the Advanced Placement Computer Science A Exam
awards.description: Achieved a perfect score, ranking in the top 0.48% out of 70,000 test-takers.
